text: Luis Pasamontes Rodriguez (born 2 October 1979 in Cangas del Narcea) is a Spanish racing cyclist, who last rode for the . ==Major results== * Tour de Wallonie – 1 stage, Mountains Classification & Sprints Classification (2007) * Volta a Catalunya – Mountains Classification (2007) * Memorial Manuel Galera (2004) ==References== ==External links== * Category:Asturian people Category:Spanish male cyclists Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:People from Narcea Category:Tour de France cyclists Category:Vuelta a España cyclists Category:Giro d'Italia cyclists
title: Luis Pasamontes
